name: Tosculi Drone
description: The Tosculi Drone is a small humanoid creature characterized by its dexterous build and agile movements, enhanced by vestigial wings.
memorable: Its Crowd Tactics ability allows it to work effectively in groups, gaining advantages in combat.
goals: To serve the hive and support its queen through cooperative combat.
relations: Often found with other Tosculi and serving the hive queen.
environment: Typically found in hive structures or areas near its queen.
strengths: Exceptional dexterity which provides agility and accuracy in combat.
weaknesses: Low strength and charisma limit physical power and social interactions.
attacks: Uses razor-sharp claws to deal slashing damage in melee combat.
most_powerful_ability: The Glide ability allows it to maneuver effectively in combat and avoids falling damage.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 ft., aiding in low-light conditions.
skills: Possesses average perception skills with a passive Perception of 11.
additional_information: Can share space with other Tosculi for tactical advantages.
Can glide gracefully to avoid fall damage.
Has a strong connection to its hive queen, sensing her location.
Strategic and cunning in combat situations.
test_queries: agile creature that glides when falling
Tosculi monster serving a hive queen
cunning small creature with claw attacks
lawful evil creature with teamwork tactics
